snippet: The fast-food chain plans to act before a pending federal requirement, and may bring other restaurants with it.
abstract: McDonald's says it will start posting calorie counts on all its menus, acting before a pending federal requirement; move could put pressure on other fast-food restaurants to do the same; company also unveils several menu additions aimed at making its offerings more healthful, including fruits and vegetables like blueberries and cucumbers.
lead_paragraph: The fast-food chain plans to act before a pending federal requirement, and may bring other restaurants with it.

headline.seo: McDonald’s to Start Posting Calorie Counts
headline.main: McDonald’s Menu to Post Calorie Data
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Menu to Post Calorie Data
